name: Insanity Ice
description:
You are an ordinary employee of a research laboratory. One of your workdays becomes a horror. Suddenly a nightmare happens and now you have to survive and figure out what's going on here...

Insanity Ice is a survival horror whose atmosphere will make you feel fear. You will have to explore many confusing and complex laboratory floors.
Hide, run, pick, choose, solve puzzles and look for a way to survive and find out how to get out of here.
